org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.impl

Class CreateNewPackageViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
              • org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.impl.BaseViewImpl<CreateNewPackagePresenter>
                • org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.impl.CreateNewPackageViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, CssConstants, CreateNewPackageView, View<CreateNewPackagePresenter>

    public class CreateNewPackageViewImpl
extends BaseViewImpl<CreateNewPackagePresenter>
implements CreateNewPackageView
    Implementation for the view that controls how the user will create a package either by setting a content directory, or, by loading a package description file.
